title: Cell Lines   schema
description: A canonical, characterized, immortalized, culture-stable cell.

CL_Name.title: CL_Name
CL_Name.description: The primary name for the cell line as determined by the biomedical community and/or initial isolation
CL_Name.schema:name: CL_Name
CL_Name.schema:description: The primary name for the cell line as determined by the biomedical community and/or initial isolation

items.title: CL_Alternative_ID
items.description: This field specifies the CLO, if available, or other common ID for the cell line or, if derived from another line, the CLO or other ID for the parent cell line. The parent cell line ID must be propagated to all cell lines derived from that parent line unless a distinct CLO has been assigned to the derived line.
items.schema:name: CL_Alternative_ID
items.schema:description: This field specifies the CLO, if available, or other common ID for the cell line or, if derived from another line, the CLO or other ID for the parent cell line. The parent cell line ID must be propagated to all cell lines derived from that parent line unless a distinct CLO has been assigned to the derived line.

items.title: CL_Center_Canonical_ID
items.description: LINCS DSGC-specific canonical ID. This will be assigned by a given LINCS DSGC according to its cell line registration scheme.
items.schema:name: CL_Center_Canonical_ID
items.schema:description: LINCS DSGC-specific canonical ID. This will be assigned by a given LINCS DSGC according to its cell line registration scheme.

items.title: CL_Relevant_Citations
items.description: List of references (with PMIDs) of relevance to cell line derivation, etc.
items.schema:name: CL_Relevant_Citations
items.schema:description: List of references (with PMIDs) of relevance to cell line derivation, etc.

items.title: CL_Center_Name
items.description: Name of the LINCS Center that is using the Cell Line
items.schema:name: CL_Center_Name
items.schema:description: Name of the LINCS Center that is using the Cell Line

items.title: CL_Center_Batch_ID
items.description: LINCS center-specific cell line ID; batch specific ID
items.schema:name: CL_Center_Batch_ID
items.schema:description: LINCS center-specific cell line ID; batch specific ID

items.title: CL_Provider_Name
items.description: Name of vendor or lab (provider) that supplied the cell line
items.schema:name: CL_Provider_Name
items.schema:description: Name of vendor or lab (provider) that supplied the cell line

items.title: CL_Provider_Catalog_ID
items.description: ID or catalogue number or name assigned to the cell line by the vendor or provider
items.schema:name: CL_Provider_Catalog_ID
items.schema:description: ID or catalogue number or name assigned to the cell line by the vendor or provider

items.title: CL_Provider_Batch_ID
items.description: Vendor/Provider Batch ID number; Batch or lot number assigned to the cell line by the vendor or provider
items.schema:name: CL_Provider_Batch_ID
items.schema:description: Vendor/Provider Batch ID number; Batch or lot number assigned to the cell line by the vendor or provider

CL_Organism.title: CL_Organism
CL_Organism.description: Organism of origin; a controlled vocabulary describing the organism from which the cell line was derived (e.g. Homo sapiens, Mus musculus, etc.)
CL_Organism.schema:name: CL_Organism
CL_Organism.schema:description: Organism of origin; a controlled vocabulary describing the organism from which the cell line was derived (e.g. Homo sapiens, Mus musculus, etc.)

CL_Organ.title: CL_Organ
CL_Organ.description: Organ of origin; controlled terms describing the organ from which cell line is derived; (e.g. lung, mammary gland etc.)
CL_Organ.schema:name: CL_Organ
CL_Organ.schema:description: Organ of origin; controlled terms describing the organ from which cell line is derived; (e.g. lung, mammary gland etc.)

CL_Tissue.title: CL_Tissue
CL_Tissue.description: Tissue of origin; A controlled vocabulary describing the tissue from which the cell line was derived

branches.name: Tissues, cell types and enzyme resources

CL_Tissue.schema:name: CL_Tissue
CL_Tissue.schema:description: Tissue of origin; A controlled vocabulary describing the tissue from which the cell line was derived

CL_Cell_Type.title: CL_Cell_Type
CL_Cell_Type.description: A controlled vocabulary describing the cell type from which a cell line was derived; e.g. epithelial like, fibroblast-like, lymphoblast like, hematopoetic, mesenchymal, neural, etc. This provides information about cell morphology. Also sometimes referred to as cell morphology.
CL_Cell_Type.schema:name: CL_Cell_Type
CL_Cell_Type.schema:description: A controlled vocabulary describing the cell type from which a cell line was derived; e.g. epithelial like, fibroblast-like, lymphoblast like, hematopoetic, mesenchymal, neural, etc. This provides information about cell morphology. Also sometimes referred to as cell morphology.

CL_Cell_Type_Detail.title: CL_Cell_Type_Detail
CL_Cell_Type_Detail.description: Additional description of cell type (histology) that is not available in CL, but may be known from other sources like ATCC
CL_Cell_Type_Detail.schema:name: CL_Cell_Type_Detail
CL_Cell_Type_Detail.schema:description: Additional description of cell type (histology) that is not available in CL, but may be known from other sources like ATCC

CL_Donor_Sex.title: CL_Donor_Sex
CL_Donor_Sex.description: Describes sex of the organism from which the cell was obtained;
CL_Donor_Sex.schema:name: CL_Donor_Sex
CL_Donor_Sex.schema:description: Describes sex of the organism from which the cell was obtained;

CL_Donor_Ethnicity.title: CL_Donor_Ethnicity
CL_Donor_Ethnicity.description: For human cells, the ethnicity of the donor
CL_Donor_Ethnicity.schema:name: CL_Donor_Ethnicity
CL_Donor_Ethnicity.schema:description: For human cells, the ethnicity of the donor

CL_Donor_Health_Status.title: CL_Donor_Health_Status
CL_Donor_Health_Status.description: Controlled vocabulary describing the health status of the donor
CL_Donor_Health_Status.schema:name: CL_Donor_Health_Status
CL_Donor_Health_Status.schema:description: Controlled vocabulary describing the health status of the donor

CL_Disease.title: CL_Disease
CL_Disease.description: If the cell line came from a particular diseased tissue, the disease should be noted in terms of a controlled vocabulary (e.g. breast cancer, colon cancer, not diseased, etc.)
CL_Disease.schema:name: CL_Disease
CL_Disease.schema:description: If the cell line came from a particular diseased tissue, the disease should be noted in terms of a controlled vocabulary (e.g. breast cancer, colon cancer, not diseased, etc.)

CL_Disease_Detail.title: CL_Disease_Detail
CL_Disease_Detail.description: Additional description of a disease related to the cell line that may not be available in the disease ontology above
CL_Disease_Detail.schema:name: CL_Disease_Detail
CL_Disease_Detail.schema:description: Additional description of a disease related to the cell line that may not be available in the disease ontology above

items.title: CL_Known_Mutations
items.description: Mutations inherent (from the donor) in the cell line, captured explicitly; e.g. if reference is not available

branches.source: Logical Observation Identifier Names and Codes
branches.name: Mutations

items.schema:name: CL_Known_Mutations
items.schema:description: Mutations inherent (from the donor) in the cell line, captured explicitly; e.g. if reference is not available

items.title: CL_Mutation_Citations
items.description: Mutations inherent in certain cell lines; from a reference
items.schema:name: CL_Mutation_Citations
items.schema:description: Mutations inherent in certain cell lines; from a reference

items.title: CL_Molecular_Features
items.description: Relevant molecular and morphological features of the Cell Line
items.schema:name: CL_Molecular_Features
items.schema:description: Relevant molecular and morphological features of the Cell Line

CL_Genetic_Modification.title: CL_Genetic_Modification
CL_Genetic_Modification.description: This field specifies any stable constructs as well as any genetic modifications (mutations, translocations) introduced into this cell line (e.g. H2B-mCherry integrated at the AAVS1 Safe Harbor locus). Details of the procedures used to generate this line (e.g. CRISPR/Cas9-mediated transformation) should be described and appropriate citations provided in the Production Details field.
CL_Genetic_Modification.schema:name: CL_Genetic_Modification
CL_Genetic_Modification.schema:description: This field specifies any stable constructs as well as any genetic modifications (mutations, translocations) introduced into this cell line (e.g. H2B-mCherry integrated at the AAVS1 Safe Harbor locus). Details of the procedures used to generate this line (e.g. CRISPR/Cas9-mediated transformation) should be described and appropriate citations provided in the Production Details field.

CL_Growth_Properties.title: CL_Growth_Properties
CL_Growth_Properties.description: A controlled vocabulary describing the growth properties of the cell line (e.g. adherent, suspension)
CL_Growth_Properties.schema:name: CL_Growth_Properties
CL_Growth_Properties.schema:description: A controlled vocabulary describing the growth properties of the cell line (e.g. adherent, suspension)

CL_Recommended_Culture_Conditions.title: CL_Recommended_Culture_Conditions
CL_Recommended_Culture_Conditions.description: A description of the standard tissue culture conditions (media, supplements, culture dish treatment) used to maintain the cell line. Description of culture dish treatment conditions would include information about coating of culture dish with fibronectin, collagen, etc, prior to cell plating. If special culture vessels are required to grow the cells, these should also be mentioned and details provided.
CL_Recommended_Culture_Conditions.schema:name: CL_Recommended_Culture_Conditions
CL_Recommended_Culture_Conditions.schema:description: A description of the standard tissue culture conditions (media, supplements, culture dish treatment) used to maintain the cell line. Description of culture dish treatment conditions would include information about coating of culture dish with fibronectin, collagen, etc, prior to cell plating. If special culture vessels are required to grow the cells, these should also be mentioned and details provided.

items.title: CL_Related_Projects
items.description: Other projects in which the cell line has been studied / used; A controlled vocabulary describing other large scale projects in which the cell line has been used (e.g. ENCODE, TCGA, ICBP, Epigenomics, etc.)
items.schema:name: CL_Related_Projects
items.schema:description: Other projects in which the cell line has been studied / used; A controlled vocabulary describing other large scale projects in which the cell line has been used (e.g. ENCODE, TCGA, ICBP, Epigenomics, etc.)

CL_Verification_Reference_Profile.title: CL_Verification_Reference_Profile
CL_Verification_Reference_Profile.description: expected STR (reference) profile of the cell line based on provider information, if available
CL_Verification_Reference_Profile.schema:name: CL_Verification_Reference_Profile
CL_Verification_Reference_Profile.schema:description: expected STR (reference) profile of the cell line based on provider information, if available

CL_Reference_Source.title: CL_Reference_Source
CL_Reference_Source.description: This field specifies a catalog entry or database record for this cell line at a cell type collection, if available, or an established external source.
CL_Reference_Source.schema:name: CL_Reference_Source
CL_Reference_Source.schema:description: This field specifies a catalog entry or database record for this cell line at a cell type collection, if available, or an established external source.

items.title: CL_Cell_Markers
items.description: A controlled vocabulary describing the markers used to isolate / identify the cell type

branches.source: Logical Observation Identifier Names and Codes
branches.name: Cell Markers - Flow Cytometry

items.schema:name: CL_Cell_Markers
items.schema:description: A controlled vocabulary describing the markers used to isolate / identify the cell type

CL_Gonosome_Code.title: CL_Gonosome_Code
CL_Gonosome_Code.description: List of the sex chomosomes (gonosome) of the sample e.g. XX, XY, XXY
CL_Gonosome_Code.schema:name: CL_Gonosome_Code
CL_Gonosome_Code.schema:description: List of the sex chomosomes (gonosome) of the sample e.g. XX, XY, XXY

CL_Disease_Site_Onset.title: CL_Disease_Site_Onset
CL_Disease_Site_Onset.description: Site of disease onset in primary cell donor
CL_Disease_Site_Onset.schema:name: CL_Disease_Site_Onset
CL_Disease_Site_Onset.schema:description: Site of disease onset in primary cell donor

CL_Disease_Age_Onset.title: CL_Disease_Age_Onset
CL_Disease_Age_Onset.description: Age of disease onset in primary cell donor (in years)
CL_Disease_Age_Onset.schema:name: CL_Disease_Age_Onset
CL_Disease_Age_Onset.schema:description: Age of disease onset in primary cell donor (in years)

CL_Donor_Age_Death.title: CL_Donor_Age_Death
CL_Donor_Age_Death.description: Age of death of primary cell donor (in years)
CL_Donor_Age_Death.schema:name: CL_Donor_Age_Death
CL_Donor_Age_Death.schema:description: Age of death of primary cell donor (in years)

CL_Donor_Disease_Duration.title: CL_Donor_Disease_Duration
CL_Donor_Disease_Duration.description: Disease duration in cell donor; Age of Sample Acquisition - Age of Onset. (in years)
CL_Donor_Disease_Duration.schema:name: CL_Donor_Disease_Duration
CL_Donor_Disease_Duration.schema:description: Disease duration in cell donor; Age of Sample Acquisition - Age of Onset. (in years)

CL_Precursor_Cell_Name.title: CL_Precursor_Cell_Name
CL_Precursor_Cell_Name.description: This field specifies the name of the parent cell line from which the cell line was derived. It is left blank if this cell line was not known to be derived from another. The particular batch of that parent line that was used to generate the new line should be specified in the Precursor Cell Batch ID (canonical) field.
CL_Precursor_Cell_Name.schema:name: CL_Precursor_Cell_Name
CL_Precursor_Cell_Name.schema:description: This field specifies the name of the parent cell line from which the cell line was derived. It is left blank if this cell line was not known to be derived from another. The particular batch of that parent line that was used to generate the new line should be specified in the Precursor Cell Batch ID (canonical) field.

CL_Precursor_Cell_LINCS_ID.title: CL_Precursor_Cell_LINCS_ID
CL_Precursor_Cell_LINCS_ID.description: This field specifies the global LINCS ID of the parent cell line from which the cell line was derived. It is left blank if this cell line was not known to be derived from another. The particular batch of the parent line that was used to generate the new line should be specified in the Production Details (canonical) field.
CL_Precursor_Cell_LINCS_ID.schema:name: CL_Precursor_Cell_LINCS_ID
CL_Precursor_Cell_LINCS_ID.schema:description: This field specifies the global LINCS ID of the parent cell line from which the cell line was derived. It is left blank if this cell line was not known to be derived from another. The particular batch of the parent line that was used to generate the new line should be specified in the Production Details (canonical) field.

CL_Precursor_Cell_Center_Batch_ID.title: CL_Precursor_Cell_Center_Batch_ID
CL_Precursor_Cell_Center_Batch_ID.description: If this cell line is derived from another registered cell line, this field should specify the Center LINCS Batch ID of the specific batch from which it was derived.
CL_Precursor_Cell_Center_Batch_ID.schema:name: CL_Precursor_Cell_Center_Batch_ID
CL_Precursor_Cell_Center_Batch_ID.schema:description: If this cell line is derived from another registered cell line, this field should specify the Center LINCS Batch ID of the specific batch from which it was derived.

CL_Production_Details.title: CL_Production_Details
CL_Production_Details.description: This field specifies the procedure(s) by which the cells were derived from the parent/precursor cell, including genetic transformations and phenotypic selections. Citations / source information for constructs and citations for procedures should be included here when appropriate.
CL_Production_Details.schema:name: CL_Production_Details
CL_Production_Details.schema:description: This field specifies the procedure(s) by which the cells were derived from the parent/precursor cell, including genetic transformations and phenotypic selections. Citations / source information for constructs and citations for procedures should be included here when appropriate.

items.title: CL_Quality_Verification
items.description: Information pertaining to experimental verification of the cell line identity; batch-specific ID; STR profiling
items.schema:name: CL_Quality_Verification
items.schema:description: Information pertaining to experimental verification of the cell line identity; batch-specific ID; STR profiling

items.title: CL_Passage_Number
items.description: The number of times, if any that the cells have been re-plated and allowed to grow back to confluency or to some maximum density if using suspension cultures.
items.schema:name: CL_Passage_Number
items.schema:description: The number of times, if any that the cells have been re-plated and allowed to grow back to confluency or to some maximum density if using suspension cultures.

items.title: CL_Source_Information
items.description: This is a free-text field that provides detailed source information for this particular batch, which may include information on from whom and when the provider obtained the cells and for what purpose the cells were obtained by the end user.
items.schema:name: CL_Source_Information
items.schema:description: This is a free-text field that provides detailed source information for this particular batch, which may include information on from whom and when the provider obtained the cells and for what purpose the cells were obtained by the end user.

items.title: CL_Date_Received
items.description: This field specifies when this batch was obtained from the provider. Because YEAR-MO-DY is not always known, this field may only contain partial date information (e.g. YEAR-MO, YEAR only).
items.schema:name: CL_Date_Received
items.schema:description: This field specifies when this batch was obtained from the provider. Because YEAR-MO-DY is not always known, this field may only contain partial date information (e.g. YEAR-MO, YEAR only).

items.title: CL_Center_Specific_Code
items.description: This field specifies the commonly used code or name for this batch at this Center, which may differ from the Provider Catalog ID and from the canonical cell line name.
items.schema:name: CL_Center_Specific_Code
items.schema:description: This field specifies the commonly used code or name for this batch at this Center, which may differ from the Provider Catalog ID and from the canonical cell line name.

schema:name: Cell Lines
